text: Amir Cheshme Khosravi "Shabani" (, born 4 May 1998) is an Iranian footballer who plays as a Midfielder who currently plays for Iranian club Pars Jonoubi Jam in the Persian Gulf Pro League. ==Club career== ===Pars Jonoubi Jam=== He made his debut for Pars Jonoubi Jam in 15th fixtures of 2018–19 Iran Pro League against Persepolis while he substituted in for Mohsen Bengar. ==References== Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Iranian footballers Category:Pars Jonoubi Jam players Category:Association football midfielders
title: Amir Cheshme Khosravi
